column1:
<rewrite>
          <rules>
            <rule name=""HTTP to HTTPS redirect"" stopProcessing=""true"">
              <match url=""(*)"" />
                <conditions>
                  <add input=""{HTTPS}"" pattern=""off"" ignoreCase=""true"" />
                </conditions>
                <action type=""Redirect"" redirectType=""Found"" url=""https://{HTTP_HOST}/{R:1}"" />
            </rule>
          </rules>
        </rewrite>
